mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.* FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE r.is_deleted = 0 AND ur.is_deleted = 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.create_at DESC

SELECT * FROM sys_role WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND ( role_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY create_at DESC
